channel.title: Astronomical event of the Day
channel.description: RSS feed of the astronomical event of the day.

item.title: September 2024 lunar eclipse
item.description: A partial lunar eclipse occurred on Wednesday, 17â€“18 September 2024, the second of two lunar eclipses in 2024 and the final partial lunar eclipse of Lunar Saros 118. This eclipse took place 9 hours before perigee meaning the moon was a supermoon with a distance of 357486 km and diameter of 33.4'.
